author: danadak
title: Collab Tools for Community DAOs
description: Las comunidades carecen de herramientas, de conocimientos útiles y de las prácticas de colaboración efectivas necesarias para crear y hacer funcionar las DAO comunitarias.

f6_assessments.q0:
This great proposal is within the challenge goal, because I think this implementation will be a need for the Cardano governace and it will help many people to reach Cardano playground and growth in the future.
This proposal is concrete (many big partenrs involved), guarantees solidity in deliverables, support transparency and accountability for all Cardano community.  .
The proposal clearly articulates the contest, the problem, the challenge and how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem and for all of the stakeholders.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer's team is very well skilled about the whole context and, knows business, sales, marketing very well, and github developer with 30 years skill on teamworks.
The scope of the solution is well explained (e.g. how the funds will be spent, what features will be implemented, and so on…)
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer provides a step-by-step plan for the implementation with clear milestones, coherent KPI metrics and a defined time horizon. the proposer also has mentioned possible difficulties and how to deal with them (HYPE Innovation https://www.hypeinnovation.com/en/) The proposal offers a realistic timetable to complete the work and coherent budget with this challenge, also if the budget are very high. Very well written proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The collab tools for community DAOs proposal tries to address the challenge DAO loves Cardano by engaging with DAO community using partner tools ie. HYPE innovation and freeos. It fits within the challenge well by providing the structure of communication between DAOs and encourage the migration towards new platform in doing so.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer team is comprised of a serial tech entrepreneur, a sales leader, an early tech founder, and a catalyst swarm core member. The engagement within existing community DAOs are ready to interact using the team tools. The team should provide more detail breakdown for funding of $75k that will only cover 12 weeks ie. 3 months. The communicating tools are readily available and the main tasks during this time frame is for engaging with the communities to establish the framework. The same rate of $100 is applied to different tasks  during this 12 week should be provided to the community to boost their confidence in the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: Despite the proposal high potential outlook, it still lacks clear information for the rationale behind budget breakdown. The community should come first and foremost when it comes to DAOs. The budget should be deployed effectively for the community and it is worthwhile to justify various activity costs in this F7 as the future funding will be required for F8 and F9 which the community has to decide on.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is about establishing an environment for collaboration to arrive at a consensus around community intentions. This is a great idea. The problem is clear, suitable to this challenge, and explained in detail. The solution is clearly described using the framework of "Input - Activities - Output - Outcome - Impact"; this helps understanding better. As a result, the expected impact is clear to the Cardano ecosystem as a whole. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree that this proposal effectively addresses the challenge, I can rate it with a score of 5
f6_assessments.q1: Team profile is provided and described clearly in detail that proves suitable skill, experiences for implementation, with reference/proof (external links) for varifying. The budget is provided with a clear strucure and an explanation of working hours. Moreover, risks and challenges are provided and analysed in detail. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's feasibility, I can rate it with a score of 5
f6_assessments.q2: There is a lot of information provided. Team and each member profile, and partners with proof (documents / links,...) for varifying. The budget is logical and clear. The roadmap is quite specific with measureable metrics. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's auditability, I can rate it with a score of 5

f6_assessments.q0: I agree with the idea in this challenge, this challenge also aims to develop means for collective decision-making or the definition of smart contracts as required by the DAO, the proposed content clearly states the interests of the DAO. benefits and necessity of the DAO. However, the solution to implement needs to be more detailed, for example, on what results and factors will the decision be executed, how voting will be done, how smart contracts on DAO will develop. . In my opinion, the proposal will be more perfect when this information is added
f6_assessments.q1: In addition to the Input - Activity - Output - Outcome - Impact information, it would be more perfect when the proponent clearly added the information I mentioned in the impact. In addition, the construction steps handle for example how the user interface is, how issues are discussed and voted on, and what percentages are agreed upon.
f6_assessments.q2: Suggested amount ~30% of the total amount of this challenge, it will be more clear when adding how the funds will be used, I see no information on how to use this money. The roadmap and necessary indicators to measure success need to be supplemented with the content I discussed in the impact and feasibility section. How are DAOs on other platforms working, what are the risks and challenges, and does this idea suffer from such problems?

solution: Un proceso de colaboración para compartir conocimientos y prácticas y una plataforma para catalizar las intenciones y acciones de las DAO comunitarias eficaces.
experience: Dan Kimball: empresario tecnológico con 40 años desarrollando productos y empresas tecnológicas; cofundador de un proyecto DAO gobernado por una comunidad activa
